sentences.en: Al facetiously described himself as the Last Angry Man.
sentences.cn: 阿尔戏称自己为“最后的怒汉”。

sentences.en: I sometimes facetiously place the cause of it all to Charley Furuseth's credit.
sentences.cn: 我有时候也曾将起因全部可笑地推在却利?福罗萨的身上.

sentences.en: Muskrat Castle as the house has been facetiously named by some waggish officer - James Fenimore Cooper.
sentences.cn: ‘麝鼠城堡’这个名字是一些爱开玩笑的官员给这座房子取的滑稽名字 —— 詹姆士·菲里莫尔·库珀.

sentences.en: Muskrat Castle as the house has been facetiously named by some waggish officer.
sentences.cn: 麝鼠城堡作为房屋的名称,是由某些诙谐的官员起的滑稽名称.

sentences.en: The house had been facetiously named by some waggish officer.
sentences.cn: 这房子是由某个机智幽默的军官命名的。

trans.tran_cn: 爱开玩笑地，滑稽地，爱开玩笑地
